About Me

Let me tell you a few things about me...

BIO

My name is Ali Mansour born and raised in the Capital of Alberta. I am a Web / Software Developer and I love making things that make life easier and more simple. You can say I am very enthusiastic about it. I began programming near the end of 2015 and currently seeking new opportunity. I Love solving problems and turning ideas into reality. Also a shopify expert.

Front End Development

Vanilla Javascript, Node.js, React.js, Redux, Ecmascript, jQuery.

Back End Development

Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Mongoose, Passport.js, Npm.

Other

Redux, Bootstrap, EJS, Semantic UI, Git, GitHub, HTML5, CSS3.
